Posts.Content: Asma wrote: hi everyone. I went for my second ultrasound. The doctor saw something and said it was too small to judge. She gave me an option of waiting three months and coming back and compare the two results or do biopsy today. I did the biopsy because I couldn't imagine waiting three months. I am still over overly stressed but it has cause a red flag to be raised in my mind. It was small n black. I saw what she was pointing to. I don't feel anything. So I guess I'll be here for two weeks waiting with everyone. I was also disappointed my husband wasn't more concerned. Nor my family. They were just saying....ok let's wait n see. It is all ok I'm sure. So now I feel like why express my worry to them. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Waiting on biopsy results Asma Asma

Posts.Content: Mar 13, 2015 04:25PM Asma wrote: thanks everyone. I'm ok and keeping busy. It's the time right before bed that gets me thinking. And looking at my small kids. I have a 10 month old, 2 yr old ,12 yr and a 20 year old. I'm busy lol That two year old is pure madness with thinking he's my ruler and I'm on earth to see to his every tantrum! lol Thanks a lot for replying. It is thoughtful
Posts.Title: Waiting on biopsy results Asma Asma
